short_description: calgary selects basketball is a basketball club based in alberta, canada.
long_description:
the calgary selects is calgary's longest-running grassroots basketball club. we aim to promote the game of basketball in the calgary region. 
the calgary selects basketball club offers advanced basketball players in grades six and up, a unique opportunity to expand their skills in a year round or seasonal program. the calgary selects program is developmental, including skill training, exhibition games, and tournament participation. the seasons typically run from september to december and from march to july. since forming in 1996 the program has established a track record of success both in grooming players to excel both in the sport and in life.
